articles.description: Re 用户可以通过请求矿池或矿工将其包含在区块中，来使得有效但非标准的交易进入区块。因为它是有效的，其他节点也会接受它。对于 op_return，标准限制还是 80 字节，但有效限制可以更大。总的来说，他似乎对铭文这类交易不是绝对否定的态度，而是认为将其定义为有效交易并对数据存储可选化。

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
RT REKTBuildr 🔺🔺🔺
Basically every single file on Ledger Live has user trackers in them
I've cleaned a bunch and there's still 310 files
Ledger REALLY wants to know what you're doing on Ledger Live. Every click, every keystroke, every thing you look at gets tracked, logged and phoned home to… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1732542258698694875


REKTBuildr 🔺🔺🔺: Cleaning user tracking code from Ledger Live code and JFC the whole thing is a gigantic user tracking system
There's analytics trackers for nearly all events, on most screens. 
Ledger Live is a user data collection tool
How is this system even accepted by the crypto community?

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
Coming to view that simplest way to outperform is: 
1) buy crypto when bitcoin realized price is below market price 
2) wait / do nothing 
3) sell when bitcoin is trading >3x it’s realized price 
4) come back when bitcoin realized price is below market price
5) repeat

Surfer: Another thing that stands out is how much more battle hardened the bitcoin holder base is vs the eth holder base which is much more paper handed. 
Realized price drawdown this bear for btc was 20% vs 50% for eth.
articles.title: Coming to view that simplest way to outperform is: 1) buy crypto when bitcoin realized price is below market price 2) wait / do nothing 3) sell when b...

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
Damn… this really puts the debasement / robbery of the working class into context.

Lyn Alden: Since the start of 2020, the United States has taken on $10.7 trillion in new public debt (i.e. accumulated deficits).
That's about $80k per household in four years.
Has your household received that much in deficit spending? Some did, but likely not yours.
articles.title: Damn… this really puts the debasement / robbery of the working class into context.
